elements.name: Intro_prep_ap_exam
elements.html: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about your readiness to prepare your students for the {workshop_course} AP Exam?

elements.name: csp_multiple_choice_apexam_w34
elements.title: I know how and when to prepare students for the multiple-choice section of the AP exam.

elements.name: assess_cpt_w34
elements.title: I am confident I can explain how students will be assessed on content and skills on the Create Performance Task of the AP exam.

elements.name: make_lessons_cpt_w34
elements.title: After attending this workshop, I have strategies to lead my students through the Make lessons in Unit 9 to adequately prepare them for the Create Performance Task.

elements.name: troublepoints_cpt_w34
elements.title: Through my participation in this workshop, I feel prepared to support my students for the AP Examâ€™s Create Performance Task by identifying potential trouble points in their project ideas.

elements.name: mvp_cpt_w34
elements.title: I am confident I can help students keep their projects within the scope of the Create Performance Task while defining project ideas that fit the criteria of a minimum viable product.

elements.name: inclusion_intro
elements.html: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about how this workshop prepared you to foster a classroom environment that is supportive for all students in your {workshop_course} course?

elements.name: strategies_ensure_inclusion_w34
elements.title: This workshop provided me with new ideas and strategies to ensure that my classroom fosters a sense of belonging.

elements.name: min_stereotype_w34
elements.visibleIf: {workshop_course}='CS Discoveries'and ({regional_partner_name} <> 'Broward County Public Schools' and {regional_partner_name}<>  'Florida International University' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Orlando Science Center' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'Tampa Bay STEM Network' and {regional_partner_name} <> 'University of North Florida & STEM2 Hub')
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I want to implement strategies to minimize stereotype threats in my classroom (e.g. present role models from diverse groups, promote a growth mindset about intelligence, support studentsâ€™ sense of belonging, create fair tests, convey high standards and assure students of their ability to meet them).

elements.title: I am committed to implementing a plan to differentiate teaching.

elements.name: next_steps_commitment_w34

elements.title: If you have any thoughts on how we can improve the post-work to be more helpful to participants in future workshops, please use this space to share them.
